name: Scrapmetalship (Ludum Dare 35)
description:
You are captain of a spaceship. After a heavy battle your spaceship is damaged. You must fight with enemy flagship for jump-engine. 
Explore Map, upgrade your ship, finding new modules and destroy enemy ships. 
Good luck! 

All code, art, animation, music and sounds was made during Ludum Dare #35

 Specially for the itch.io in June 2017 we did an update version with a few changes in the gameplay (like disassemble ship parts, randomize map on start, big bug fix etc).

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

P.S. To disassemble ship - Hold CONTROL and click Right Mouse Button on parts in build mode!!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________
